description: A gamey and earthy tasting rich chilli dish.
name: Venison Chilli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and chopped
1 medium red capsicum, de-seeded and chopped
1 medium green chilli, de-seeded and sliced
1 medium red chilli, de-seeded and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large saucepan to a medium heat and add the canola oil.
Fry the onions, garlic, pepper and chillies for 4 minutes while tossing.
Add the diced venison to the pan and fry while tossing for a further 4 minutes.
Add the rest of the ingredients and lower to the heat to a simmer.
While stirring occasionally, allow the entire dish to simmer for 20 minutes so that the sauce can reduce.
Remove from the heat and suggested to serve with rice or naan breads.
